mapper.select:
select u.id, u.email, u.name, u.tel_no, u.in_date, bname.code_name as bankName, b.acc as bankAccount, phist.balance, detail.deal_count, detail.paysum, pqust.pqust_count, u.enabled, u.memo from user u left outer join bank_account b on u.id = b.user_id
left outer join (select user_id, count(*) as deal_count, sum(pymt_prc) as paysum from deal_detail group by user_id ) AS detail on u.id = detail.user_id
left outer join (select code, code_name from cmmn_code where code_type='BANK_NAME' ) AS bname on b.bnk_code = bname.code
left outer join (select * from pnt_hist where id IN (select max(id) from pnt_hist group by user_id ) ) AS phist on u.id = phist.user_id
left outer join (select user_id, count(*) as pqust_count from cs_psnl_qust group by user_id ) AS pqust on u.id = pqust.user_id
where u.id=#{userId} ;
mapper.update: update user set memo=#{memo} where id=#{id}
update user set enabled=#{enabled} where id=#{id}
